headers.value: default-src 'self';style-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com;style-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com;img-src *;connect-src *;frame-ancestors 'none';script-src 'self';frame-src 'none'; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; media-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; manifest-src 'self'; worker-src 'self'; prefetch-src 'self'
